about_the_game:
This Smooth Jazz soundtrack will have you noddin' your head and tappin' your toes. When in game the sleuth hairs on your neck will be standing up as the tracks each highlight the levels expertly while they guide you through the detective mystery.

Santana Rojas and his band are a group of students at the University of Texas at Austin who spend their nights entertaining at local Austin jazz spots. Get the album now and be able to say "I knew them when" because these young men are going to blow up!

The sextet consists of:
Ben Ramierz (Bass)
Alejandro San Miguel (Sax)
Santana Rojas (Trumpet)
Kevin Hrabak (Trombone)
Collin McCord (Drums)
Jakob Hartz (Piano)

fullgame.name: Yoko Redux: Dreams of a Blue Planet

name: Yoko Redux: Dreams Soundtrack
short_description: A smooth jazz soundtrack of 6 original instrumental songs for the game Yoko Redux: Dreams of a Blue planet. Composed and performed by the Santana Rojas Sextet beginning with the debut single Domino.
